name: Corned Beef Roast
author: LUVNGMOM
summary: This is a basic corned beef roast recipe. It is easy to prepare and wonderful to eat.
ingredients: 1 (5 1/2 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Place the brisket in the center of a roasting pan
Arrange the potatoes and carrots around the sides
Place the onion and garlic on top of the roast, and season with salt and pepper
Empty the seasoning packet over the roast, and pour enough water into the pan to almost cover the potatoes
Cover with a lid or heavy aluminum foil
Roast for 5 to 6 hours in the preheated oven, until the roast is so tender it can be flaked apart with a fork
